item.description:
Posted as an FYI - you are on your own if you want to go, but RSVP so others can look for you!

Every year I tell myself I'm going to go, and every year I'm doing something else and can't go. So, THIS TIME, I'm telling you all about it so you can go and tell me all about it! :-)

Anyway, the reports are that it's a sight to see, so I hope some of you will have a chance to see it! If you are interested in hosting this event just let me know!

Here's a link to their website and there's video! Just scroll down the page:

http://www.thesteelyard.org/events/calendar/2012/10/26/206

Â 

Details:

Join the Steel Yard and the Iron Guild for the 7th annual Halloween Iron Pour.
Rain date: October 27th.
$10

5:00 - Doors open
5:30 - Reclaim, an aerial dance by Teresa Kochis & Michelle Struckholz, with live music by Cave of Colors
6:00 - DJ Unkle Thirsty
7:00 - Iron Pour Begins, with music provided by The Empty House Cooperative

There will also be a ceramic sale hosted by the Ceramics Cooperative.
Food vendors will be on site.

The 7th Annual Halloween Iron Pour is made possible by the generous support of Cumberland Foundry, Buonaccorsi+Agniel, The Bently Foundation, Malloy Biodiesel, Millhaus, an anonymous sponsor, The City of Providence, Providence Parks and Recreation, and the Department of Arts, Culture, and Tourism.
item.how_to_find_us: This is posted as an FYI - I will probably not make this one - again, but wanted you all to know about it. Please RSVP if you want to go, so others can find you!
item.name: P-Collective FYI - Steel Yard's 7th Annual Halloween Iron Pour!
